entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 5:13 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
